Title: Separation Anxiety
Plot: As the school year draws to a close, changes abound for the class of 2001. While Joey and Dawson deal with their respective break-ups, Jen makes a startling decision about her future. In his own way, Jack helps Jen to rethink it. Meanwhile, Dawson has his own decision to make with regards to Gretchen when an unusual opportunity comes their way. And when Mr. Kubelik from Worthington asks Joey to bring Pacey with her to a party for incoming freshman, which fills the pair with hope that they might
GuestStars: Peter Jurasik, Liz Ernest, Eric Paisley, Leslie Riley, Martha Terry, Lucas Waterworth, Rob Zapple
